ing: 1 (3.25 ounce) can sliced black olives, drained
des: "This salad is very fast and easy to make and has great flavor. This is my favorite salad to have on a hot summer day. It's refreshing and I know that I'm getting a good dose of veggies."
ins: Place the cucumber, tomato, celery, black olives, and blue cheese in a mixing bowl. Pour in the red wine, mix, and you're done!
